channel.title: Bluurr webclient
channel.description:
Hello , I wanted to ask for some help with Bluurr webclients ,i know how to make a webclient at any client but that , I edit the things in it and make it for webclient, If i run it with run.bat , it downloads cache fine and runs fine, IF i Jar it , it doesnt connect to the ip but it connects to localhost and downloads the cache fine, AND yes i tried client and i tried Gui as main class manifest for teh Jar maker.
Any ideas? Please contact at: hamzah_Adwan@hotmail.com Thanks in advance.
~~Aladwan

item.title: Bluurr webclient
item.dc:creator: @elderscape elderscape
item.description:
@elderscape wrote:

Hello ,
I wanted to ask for some help with Bluurr webclients ,i know how to make a webclient at any client but that ,
I edit the things in it and make it for webclient,
If i run it with run.bat , it downloads cache fine and runs fine,
IF i Jar it , it doesnt connect to the ip but it connects to localhost and downloads the cache fine,
AND yes i tried client and i tried Gui as main class manifest for teh Jar maker.

Any ideas?
Please contact at: hamzah_Adwan@hotmail.com
Thanks in advance.

~~Aladwan
